title: An authentication error has occured (Code: 0x80080005)
author: captainhook
body_snippet:
I am running a clean instance of mRemoteNG 1.78.2 NB 3228 on Win 11 25H2.

When using Quick Connect to try to RDP to a machine, I get:
[Window Title]
Remote Desktop Connection

[Content]
An authentication error has occurred (Code: 0x80080005).

Remote computer: POC01

[^] Hide details  [OK]

[Expanded Information]
Error code: 0x0
Extended error code: 0x0
Timestamp (UTC): 01/21/26 10:53:14 AM
Activity ID: e1c08c6b-b08c-4c30-8d66-c7c1a2c90000

---
Any suggestions?

iterations.description: Not our bug - Windows Update KB5074109 auth error, cannot reproduce

comments.snippet:
I got the same error for Windows App that I use to access Windows 365. Later I found that it was because of a windows update "KB5074109" . May be give it a try 
https://www.techfixerlab.com/2026/01/fix-rdp-error-0x80080005-after-windows.html
comments.author: BhashkarGupta

comments.snippet: hello, I cant reproduce this, @captainhook  could you please provide more information about exact build you are using and if mentioned above update is installed?
comments.author: Kvarkas
